answers.answer: Any sudden weight loss, should be a matter of concern.  You should talk to your doctor and ask to get tested for both hyperthyroidism and diabetes since rapid weight loss is a symptom of both and both can be very dangerous.I can't answer about the pain.  If the ultra sound showed nothing, it would be up to your doctor to determine if further tests would be beneficial.
